sect1.title: SOAP Services Endpoints
sect1.para: This page allows to create new or manage existing SOAP endpoints.
Click on button in presented list of virtual hosts to open the list of SOAP endpoints.
When virtual host is selected denoted by , a new endpoint can be added via "Add new directory" link or existing to be managed via links under "Actions" column.
The test links (VSMX pages) are accessible via link on the Endpoint logical path.
To create a new virtual host, use the "HTTP Services" "Server management" page.
